title: Luxury goods market worldwide by segment share in 2007 and 2012
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups 2007, and 2012. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Segment share.
Out of all 2 groups, 2007 had the highest Segment share in Race Fashion / Apparel and 2007 had the lowest Segment share in Race Other.
Among all the Races, 2012 had the highest Segment share in Race Fashion / Apparel and lowest Segment share in Race Other.
The maximum Segment share for 2012 that was found in Race Fashion / Apparel was 4.15 times larger than the minimum Segment share observed in Race Other.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Segment share on the Y-axis for 5 different Races for 2 groups 2007, and 2012 that are presented on the X-axis.
Race Fashion / Apparel had the maximum Segment share among all 2 groups, and it was for 2007. The minimum Segment share was observed in Race Other for 2007.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups 2007, and 2012. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Segment share.
Out of all 2 groups, 2007 had the highest Segment share in Race Fashion / Apparel and 2007 had the lowest Segment share in Race Other.
Among all the Races, 2012 had the highest Segment share in Race Fashion / Apparel and lowest Segment share in Race Other.
The maximum Segment share for 2012 that was found in Race Fashion / Apparel was 4.15 times larger than the minimum Segment share observed in Race Other.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 5 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups 2007, and 2012. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Segment share.
Out of all 2 groups, 2007 had the highest Segment share in Race Fashion / Apparel and 2007 had the lowest Segment share in Race Other.
Among all the Races, 2012 had the highest Segment share 419.0 in Race Fashion / Apparel and lowest value 101.0 in Race Other.
Race Fashion / Apparel and Other had the biggest gap of 318.0 between the highest and lowest Segment share found for 2012.
Among all 2 groups, 2007 had the gap of 433.0 between the maximum and minimum Segment share observed in Race Fashion / Apparel and Other respectively.
On average, the Race Fashion / Apparel had the highest Segment share for all 2 groups 2007, and 2012. Whereas Other had the lowest average Segment share.
